  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x136
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x136
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x104
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 280x19
          text run at (0,0) width 280: "The next two paragraphs should look identical:"

          text run at (3,3) width 29: "Test."

        LayoutText {#text} at (3,3) size 29x19
